description: Zone-based behaviors that create interactive areas, triggers, and environmental effects in the game world

alertzone.name: Alert Zone
alertzone.description: Creates a zone that alerts nearby enemies when the player enters it. Can be configured for single or multiple use with customizable alert range and zone height detection.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player enters the alert zone

properties.name: ALERT_RANGE
properties.description: Range at which enemies will be alerted when player enters the zone

properties.name: ALERT_MODE
properties.description: Whether the zone can be triggered multiple times or only once

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Creates a teleportation zone that can transport players to connected locations or other levels. Features multiple teleport effects, level requirements, and spawn marker support.

properties.name: TELEPORT_ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the teleport zone

properties.name: TELEPORT_TYPE
properties.description: Type of teleportation effect

properties.name: TELEPORT_MODE
properties.description: Whether the teleport can be used multiple times

properties.name: TELEPORT_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before teleportation occurs

properties.name: TELEPORT_EFFECT
properties.description: Visual effect during teleportation

properties.name: TELEPORT_EXIT_ANGLE
properties.description: Player exit angle upon teleport

properties.name: PARTICLE_NAME
properties.description: Name of particle effect to use for teleportation

properties.name: PLAYER_LEVEL
properties.description: Player level required to use this teleport

properties.name: DESTINATION
properties.description: Whether to teleport to a local location or another level

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: User global required for using inter-level spawn markers (e.g., MySpawnMarkers)

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME
properties.description: Name of spawn marker for optional spawning

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the teleport at start

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: Controls whether to load the next level in the Storyboard or a specific level

properties.name: ResetStates
properties.description: Whether to reset states when entering the next level

collect_zone.name: Collect Zone
collect_zone.description: Creates a zone that automatically collects and destroys objects that enter it. Can increment or deduct user global values based on object weight or fixed values.

properties.name: NOTIFICATION
properties.description: Message displayed when an entity is collected

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the entity can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: COUNT_STYLE
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the user global

properties.name: COUNT_TYPE
properties.description: How to calculate the value to add/deduct

properties.name: FIXED_VALUE
properties.description: Fixed value to increment/deduct the user global by

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: User global that will be affected (e.g., MyPoints)

properties.name: ACTIVATE_LOGIC
properties.description: Whether to activate logic connections when an entity is collected

stealthzone.name: Stealth Zone
stealthzone.description: Creates a zone that affects player stealth mechanics when entered. Can modify player visibility, sound levels, and AI detection ranges.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player enters the stealth zone

properties.name: STEALTH_MODE
properties.description: How the stealth zone affects player stealth

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the stealth zone

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

hurt.name: Hurt Zone
hurt.description: Creates a zone that damages the player when entered. Features configurable damage amounts, damage types, and visual effects.

properties.name: DAMAGE_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount of damage dealt to the player

properties.name: DAMAGE_TYPE
properties.description: Type of damage dealt

properties.name: DAMAGE_INTERVAL
properties.description: Time between damage ticks in seconds

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the hurt zone

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

heal.name: Heal Zone
heal.description: Creates a zone that heals the player when entered. Features configurable healing amounts, healing rates, and visual effects.

properties.name: HEAL_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount of health restored to the player

properties.name: HEAL_INTERVAL
properties.description: Time between healing ticks in seconds

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the heal zone

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

spawn_locator.name: Spawn Locator
spawn_locator.description: Creates a spawn point that can be used by teleports and level transitions. Supports custom spawn markers and player positioning.

properties.name: SPAWN_NAME
properties.description: Name of this spawn locator

properties.name: SPAWN_ANGLE
properties.description: Angle the player will face when spawning

properties.name: SPAWN_HEIGHT
properties.description: Height offset for player spawn position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to activate the spawn locator at start

level_zone.name: Level Zone
level_zone.description: Creates a zone that triggers level transitions when the player enters. Supports storyboard logic and specific level loading.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player enters the level zone

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the level zone

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: Controls whether to load the next level in the Storyboard or a specific level

properties.name: ResetStates
properties.description: Whether to reset states when entering the new level

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

winzone.name: Win Zone
winzone.description: Creates a zone that triggers a win condition when the player enters. Can be configured for different win scenarios and level transitions.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player wins

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the win zone

properties.name: WIN_ACTION
properties.description: Action to take when player wins

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

ambienceinzone.name: Ambience in Zone
ambienceinzone.description: Creates a zone that changes the ambient lighting and atmosphere when the player enters. Features RGB color control and exposure adjustment.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when ambience changes

properties.name: AMBIENCE_R
properties.description: Red component of ambient light

properties.name: AMBIENCE_G
properties.description: Green component of ambient light

properties.name: AMBIENCE_B
properties.description: Blue component of ambient light

properties.name: EXPOSURE
properties.description: Exposure level for the ambient lighting

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the ambience zone

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

soundinzone.name: Sound in Zone
soundinzone.description: Creates a zone that plays specific sounds when the player enters. Features configurable sound selection and zone height detection.

properties.name: SOUND_MODE
properties.description: How the sound should be played

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the sound zone

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

textinzone.name: Text in Zone
textinzone.description: Creates a zone that displays text messages when the player enters. Features configurable text content and display timing.

properties.name: TEXT_CONTENT
properties.description: Text to display when player enters the zone

properties.name: DISPLAY_TIME
properties.description: How long to display the text in seconds

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the text zone

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

videoinzone.name: Video in Zone
videoinzone.description: Creates a zone that plays video content when the player enters. Features configurable video files and playback options.

properties.name: VIDEO_FILE
properties.description: Path to the video file to play

properties.name: PLAYBACK_MODE
properties.description: How the video should be played

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the video zone

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start

hud_zone.name: HUD Zone
hud_zone.description: Creates a zone that shows or hides HUD elements when the player enters. Features configurable HUD visibility and zone height detection.

properties.name: HUD_ACTION
properties.description: Action to take with HUD elements

properties.name: HUD_ELEMENTS
properties.description: Specific HUD elements to affect (or 'all' for all elements)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the HUD zone

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start
